void ConfigFile::deleteGroup ( const QString &  name  )  [virtual]

Deletes a group if it exists.

If the group doesn't already exists this will do nothing.

Parameters:

QStringList ConfigFile::groupLists (  ) 

Gets the list of all the groups in the configuration file.

Returns:
List of groups in this configuration file. If no groups are found it will return an empty list.
